page.title: 11IFOLD GENERAL SURVEY
page.content: {Ifold was once just fields and trees. The Ifold area has always been connected with farming. The word "Ifold" comes from the Olde English word meaning "Well watered farm." A famous building was{Ifold House}which was demolished in 1836. The road now known as "The Ride" was a riding path taken by riders on the Estate. It was then known as "Pine Walk." "The Drive" was the main entrance to to Ifold House. {In the last 25 years building in Ifold {has rapidly accelerated}to the extent of the following: The Drive 116 houses The Ride 63 houses. Chalk Road 60 houses. Hogwood Road and The Lane 22 houses. There is only 1 shop and 1 garage in Ifold.
